Converter - Annotation Type in se.jguru.nazgul.core.reflection.api.conversion
Annotation defining a method or constructor accepting a single argument with a given (source) type, and returning a non-void object (called target type).
ConverterRegistry - Interface in se.jguru.nazgul.core.reflection.api.conversion
Type converter registry specification, used as a generic type conversion service.
